html:
6.5.25  12:50 am   how do you deal with criticism? im really bad at dealing with it, even when it's constructive or when i know it's super useful to me and i force myself to seek it out, it always really hurts when someone says they don't like something i made. like, it feels Personal, for some reason? and i want to be able to get over that, cuz it sometimes can kill my motivation to work on something. or i'll gaslight myself into believing that something isn't good cuz someone else said they (subjectively) didn't like it, even though before they said that i was proud of it and liked it myself

      certainly i can say it might be a curse to let anyone see your work before it's done. reading between the lines it sounds like you've been doing that. even worse, it's probably not a good idea to 'show someone' something while you are there, and you've decided that they are going to see it at that time. i think it's much better to just put it somewhere and if they happen to find it and want to reach out to you about it then that's cool

6.5.25  12:24 am   What's your opinion of Soap Tips? It's my first exposure to any of your stuff.

      it's essentially the doing the same thing "hi, i'm steve" does. basically i just start writing from the beginning and see what happens. and i'm allowed to go for longer than i might have done previously with a non-song. mostly narrated by 1 character

6.4.25  10:58 pm   How would you prepare if you were informed that alien space bugs are about to invade the planet in order to harvest all our dinner leftovers (but nothing else, they only eat dinner leftovers)

      no need to prepare

6.4.25  9:38 pm   why does the president hate my school

      could be a mood swing? keep in mind this is nothing personal, i haven't even checked to see who the president is lately

6.4.25  8:59 pm   bought me a bar of soap, any tips on what to do?

      i have no idea. i don't really understand barred soap

6.4.25  6:14 pm   how will you be celebrating pride month?

      i prefer to have pride according to my own schedule. i'll be honest it would probably add up to more than 1/12 of the year

6.4.25  6:08 pm   they say "art is how we decorate space, music is how we decorate time". do you have any plans to make space decorations?

      i think you're forgetting something

6.4.25  5:11 pm   Maakt het uit in welke taal een songtekst is? Of zijn alle talen even goed voor elk liedje?

      changing the language of a song almost always requires a rewrite. heck, changing the language of anything requires a rewrite, but songs especially because they play on the language so intimately

6.4.25  5:03 pm   what is your mentality like when youre answering these questions, is it like a chore or a routine or something relaxing to do

      each day is a new opportunity to potentially make some magic somewhere if i can. basically it carries all the same values of any creative medium, except the ridiculous thing about this one is it's almost impossible for it to snowball out of hand. so in that sense, this paradigm always been a gleaming role model for the other departments, in terms of how i might one day fix my life

6.4.25  4:53 pm   what is the possibility that you are just 3 kids in a trench coat?

      i don't even know what a trench coat is, other than a thing that 3 kids are always supposed to be in. so it's a bit like curds and whey. .... or a tuffet.

6.4.25  3:45 pm   how do you feel about questions that are not being answered

      fine

6.4.25  1:50 pm   are you a wizard?

      for all the hype, i'd sure better be

6.4.25  12:18 pm   how often do people send you their theories about the universe?

      technically every question is a theory about the universe

6.4.25  12:10 pm   Why did I sleep all month long? 

      maybe you were awake for the entire previous month

6.4.25  11:56 am   How do i know if i asked the right question 

      the one thing that's guaranteed is it carries the same right/wrong status as every other question. either every question is right, or every question is wrong. although i'm not sure which of these 2 scenarios is correct

6.4.25  11:12 am   what are your thoughts on jazz?

      it's literally a 4-letter word

6.4.25  11:11 am   Do you think cats are better?

      no, but the main problem is you need 2 things for betterness to be imposed

6.4.25  11:08 am   when ur analyzing and compartmentalizing your anecdotes on the potential synchronicities and alignments of different spiritual concepts in the irrationality of human behavior but u have to get really rich for basically no reason

      it's ironic that you of all people would have missed any connection there could be between these two phenomena

6.4.25  9:32 am   Is 13:37 the most leet time of day?

      not exactly

6.4.25  5:02 am   You always tell people that if they aren't motivated to do the thing they want to learn, then they don't really want to do it and should stop.

     i don't know if that's a totally fair paraphrase

      But I don't necessarily agree, since one could want to be good at something without being motivated to spend the time to become good at it. I'd love to be good at playing piano because I love music and want to make it, but spending time learning notes and chords and such isn't exciting to me so I never practice. How do you feel about this?

      it's almost impossible to learn if you're not excited and curious. that's what i think i've learned about learning. so what does that mean for your piano playing? i'm actually not sure

6.4.25  4:40 am   maybe this sounds dumb but how do you talk about music with your friends thats not "have you heard" and "yeah it was good"

      sometimes songs remind you of other songs, and you can mention those ones too. sometimes you can talk about parts of songs. sometimes you notice patterns among many songs. as you start listening to older music, you constantly notice more and more cases of "oh that's where that came from", cases of newer songs copying things from the past

6.4.25  3:57 am   what the hell am I supposed to do after the Oilers win the Stanley cup final

      you might have to start following another sport

6.4.25  2:16 am   If you woke up as a giraffe tomorrow, how would you feel?

      it's probably never possible to predict future feelings, but i would probably be shocked

6.4.25  1:58 am   have you, or will you time travel(ed)?

      it's impossible to NOT time travel. time is required for travel. if you don't believe me, check the time, and then travel somewhere and check the time again

6.4.25  1:21 am   What can I do for Father's Day 

      maybe call your mother? just thinking outside the box here

6.4.25  1:11 am   Do you like the word "miffed"? To me personally it's one of those words that means exactly what it sounds like it means.

      i don't really know what it means. to me it sounds like it means.... some kind of scheduling mishap

6.4.25  12:39 am   Now that it's June, will it soon be July?

      yes i believe so

6.4.25  12:28 am   how was ur june 3rd

      pretty good

6.3.25  11:23 pm   if i send a chord transcription here of one of your songs, would you be able to tell me how good i did? 

      sure

6.3.25  10:33 pm   any tips for how to deal with anxiety?

      physical movement can be good, unless you have already been doing too much physical movement, in which case you could do less physical movement

6.3.25  10:10 pm   do you think we're alone in the universe? and if we're not, do you think they're just like us or are they just weird creatures

      i've been going with the assumption that the universe is not physically finite in size. so that then leads to the assumption that just about every possible thing goes on, somewhere

6.3.25  9:17 pm   I refuse to believe that you have nothing at all ready to release... something's gotta be done and you're just fretting over how it's not ready when it totally is

      sure i'll just release it with no camera angles. i'll just leave the camera at the origin the whole time and you'll see nothing. seems pretty chill

6.3.25  8:03 pm   have you ever done two strikes in a row in a game of bowling

      i think so, but then again it might have been baseball

6.3.25  8:01 pm   there's this girl in my class who i think might hate me. almost every time i'm nearby (seats/tables change every week), shemoves to a different seat far away from her assigned seat. we have spoken before, and she didn't seem mad, so i'm not totally sure. i would ask her why she hates me, but i ran this scenario in my mind and in that scenario sheasked me the real question is why am i paying so much attention to her. and scenario-she is right, i don't have an answer to that question, i don't know why the fuck i notice her so much, i don't know what's wrong with me. ifind her to be very noticeable, she has a lot of qualities that i may or may not care that much about, she's very smart in that bored kind of way because it's all so easy for her, but she's curious and an original thinker, she's also quite the comedian when she wants to be, and she's into science and gaming and art. goddammit, maybe i'm just overthinking it, she doesn't like that i notice her, she probably thinks it's creepy, i reap what i sow, i should just keep my mouth shut

     yes it is definitely true that you have spent an awful lot of time thinking about this person who you haven't met. not always a healthy start to a relationship. the greatest remedy for this is to find something new to think about

6.3.25  6:56 pm   Do you think that it could be a good idea for up-and-coming musicians with minor interests in other subjects (but for whom music is still their main passion) to go to college after high school, not for music, but to major in another field (connected to one of those aforementioned minor interests), that way they could get a good job in that field, thus allowing them to pursue their true passion in music without having to rely financially on the mercurial nature of the music industry?

      i don't have a good understanding of what college is or does nowadays, and on top of that i also never had a good understanding of what it did or was before. from the outside it feels very much like a secret club but i have no idea if that's correct

6.3.25  5:29 pm   I'm about to come into possession of a whole load of free time and I think I want to learn the keyboard. I have one, but I have basically no knowledge of music theory - do you have any tips for how to get started? Should I learn some basics or literally just figure it out by playing it and try to rediscover music theory as I see fit? It feels like doing it the latter way would make it difficult for me to ever communicate with other people about my music, but maybe it's not too hard to learn the names for things when you have an understanding of them? Anyway, any advice would be greatly appreciated

Thank you! (By the way your music is awesome)

      there's so many ways to learn musical things, and i'm pretty sure the way i do it is nothing like the way most people do it. so it would probably be unwise to just recommend my way. also i don't entirely remember because i learned most of the basics when i was 2 or 3 years old

6.3.25  5:28 pm   how many string cheeses tall are you

      1

6.3.25  5:15 pm   What does Microsoft Excel excel at?

      i think it's supposed to excel at spreadsheets

6.3.25  4:03 pm   Do you like water

      yes

6.3.25  3:43 pm   Is the Mail Woman from "Hi I'm Steve" a trans allegory? She did say being a woman is the way she likes to live her life.

      i dont know the word 'allegory', but here's what i think certainly happened: the phrase "mail man" came up. and then you go from there. when i write i'm usually go for the thrills

6.3.25  3:37 pm   how many years are there in a day

      about .00274

6.3.25  3:23 pm   ev'ry time i visit this website i end up leaving it with an insatiable desire to make as many things as possible. well, i'll admit that's always there, but you tend to amplify it to the extreme. so this site's a great desire amplifier 

      oh that's pretty cool

6.3.25  2:58 pm   What percentage of the questions on here are from people asking you if they should commit suicide and/or telling you that they are going to commit suicide? 

      maybe .05%

6.3.25  2:40 pm   i installed an extension to block certain websites, i always judged myself for the hypthethical of doing it, thinking "i can do this alone i dont need tools" but boy has it helped deprogram muscle memory. Sometimes i dont even intend to go to a website, my fingers just go there. I also feel a bit more anxious about sitting with the pauses. perhaps i should just do some breathing excercises whenever a website is blocked

      how about building something

6.3.25  2:14 pm   How to guitar well?

      i'd say just get a guitar in your life and keep it there

6.3.25  1:17 pm   Why does hating myself makes sense but not the other way around?

      sometimes it's seen as rude to like yourself

6.3.25  12:35 pm   i dont want to ask a question right now if thats ok with you

      yes that's fine

6.3.25  12:32 pm   have you ever slipped through a gap in the matrix?

     i'm assuming we all do that constantly

     or like.. have a cryptic phrase that sounds like it is nonsense but later on will be seen as profound wisdom in a time of need?

      yes i believe that's happened before

6.3.25  12:25 pm   Just got my driving license, where could I go?

      how about down the street

6.3.25  10:50 am   is writing equivalent to dancing

      not exactly, but there's many similarities
